DESCRIPTION:
The once people began to colonize Mars and have achieved great success in this. They have created a whole areas suitable for human and animal life by learning to control the spread of plant organisms that are saturated with the atmosphere of life-giving oxygen. On the Red Planet of the city grew, there were agricultural centers, research centers. Everything was going great - it seemed that people have managed to create a new home away from his native land. But the trouble was not far off. As a result of global catastrophe on the planet into chaos. Overnight, the most valuable resource in the colonies was the water, and by the corporations that own it springs broke out bloody struggle for power. Fighting violent and did not stop for the day.
